newsitem.title: USA: Hexcel names Habermeier vice chairman.
newsitem.headline: Hexcel names Habermeier vice chairman.

text.p: Hexcel Corp on Friday said Juergen Habermeier, president and chief operating officer, was appointed vice chairman.
In his new position, Habermeier will focus primarily on the company's strategic direction, Hexcel said.

Habermeier had been Hexcel's president and chief operating officer since joining the company through Hexcel's acquisition of the worldwide composite materials businesses of Ciba-Geigy AG CIGZ.S in February 1996.
John Lee, chairman and chief executive, will assume the title of president, Hexcel said.
The chief operating officer position was eliminated and a senior operating committee will assume those responsibilities, Hexcel said.
Hexcel makes honeycomb, reinforcement fabrics, advanced composites and resins.
